q: Rewards and punishment is the lowest form of education.
h:
“Rewards and punishment is the lowest form of education.” —
Zhuangzi

q: Life is like stepping onto a boat which is about to sail out to sea and sink.
h:
“Life is like stepping onto a boat which is about to sail out to sea and sink.” —
Shunryu Suzuki

q: I live by letting things happen.
h:
“I live by letting things happen.” —
Dogen

q: It's easier to lose than to win.
h:
“It's easier to lose than to win. ” —
Wayne Gretzky

q: New opinions are always suspected, and usually opposed, without any other reason but because they are not common.
h:
“New opinions are always suspected, and usually opposed, without any other reason but because they are not common.” —
John Locke

q: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something.
h:
“The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something.” —
Barack Obama

q: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
h:
“Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Conquer the devils with a little thing called love.
h:
“Conquer the devils with a little thing called love.” —
Bob Marley

q: The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
h:
“The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.” —
Chinese Proverb

q: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
h:
“The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
h:
“The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.” —
Ayn Rand

q: Always look on the bright side of things. If you can't comprehend this, polish that which has become dull until it begins to shine.
h:
“Always look on the bright side of things. If you can't comprehend this, polish that which has become dull until it begins to shine.” —
Zen Proverb

q: Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress: Working hard for something we love is called passion.
h:
“Working hard for something we don't care about is called stress: Working hard for something we love is called passion.” —
Simon Sinek

q: Don't bother people for help without first trying to solve the problem yourself.
h:
“Don't bother people for help without first trying to solve the problem yourself.” —
Colin Powell

q: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.
h:
“The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
h:
“Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
h:
“Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.” —
Mahatma Gandhi

q: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
h:
“Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
h:
“I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.” —
Og Mandino

q: You may be one person in this world, but to one person you may mean the world.
h:
“You may be one person in this world, but to one person you may mean the world.” —
Unknown

q: Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not
h:
“Others have seen what is and asked why. I have seen what could be and asked why not” —
Pablo Picasso

q: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
h:
“Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.” —
William James

q: What a liberation to realize that 'the voice in my head' is not who I am. Who am I then? The one who sees that.
h:
“What a liberation to realize that 'the voice in my head' is not who I am. Who am I then? The one who sees that.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.
h:
“The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it.” —
Criss Jami

q: Things do not have meaning. We assign meaning to everything.
h:
“Things do not have meaning. We assign meaning to everything.” —
Tony Robbins

q: You can easily judge the character of a man by how he treats those who can do nothing for him.
h:
“You can easily judge the character of a man by how he treats those who can do nothing for him.” —
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

q: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything.
h:
“If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything.” —
John Wooden

q: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
h:
“Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body. ” —
Seneca

q: I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
h:
“I didn't get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.” —
Estee Lauder

q: You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.
h:
“You are the only problem you will ever have and you are the only solution.” —
Bob Proctor

q: Greatness comes from living with purpose and passion.
h:
“Greatness comes from living with purpose and passion.” —
Ralph Marston

q: It is safer to search in the maze than to remain in a cheeseless situation.
h:
“It is safer to search in the maze than to remain in a cheeseless situation.” —
Spencer Johnson

q: It is easy to love your friend, but sometimes the hardest lesson to learn is to love your enemy.
h:
“It is easy to love your friend, but sometimes the hardest lesson to learn is to love your enemy.” —
Sun Tzu

q: Do not regret the past. Look to the future.
h:
“Do not regret the past. Look to the future.” —
Soyen Shaku

q: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.
h:
“Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self. ” —
Ralph Marston

q: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
h:
“Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.” —
Thomas Edison

q: Start the day with love, spend the day with love, fill the day with love and end the day with love.
h:
“Start the day with love, spend the day with love, fill the day with love and end the day with love.” —
Sathya Sai Baba

q: It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going.
h:
“It doesn't matter where you are coming from. All that matters is where you are going. ” —
Brian Tracy

q: Failure is acceptable. Not trying is a whole different ball park.
h:
“Failure is acceptable. Not trying is a whole different ball park.” —
Michael Jordan

q: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
h:
“I learned the value of hard work by working hard. ” —
Margaret Mead

q: Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.
h:
“Every failure brings with it the seed of an equivalent success.” —
Napoleon Hill

q: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny.
h:
“Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny.” —
Joan Rivers

q: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
h:
“All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers. ” —
Orison Swett Marden

q: Fear of death is fear of the Unknown.
h:
“Fear of death is fear of the Unknown.” —
Adi Da Samraj

q: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
h:
“The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.” —
Alan Watts

q: The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.
h:
“The only thing more frustrating than slanderers is those foolish enough to listen to them.” —
Criss Jami

q: The future is no more uncertain than the present.
h:
“The future is no more uncertain than the present.” —
Walt Whitman

q: We win by helping each other win.
h:
“We win by helping each other win.” —
Jack Butcher

q: Every one of us is the sum total of his own thoughts.
h:
“Every one of us is the sum total of his own thoughts.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
h:
“The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering. ” —
Bruce Lee
